channel.title: Help client cant find java?

item.title: Help client cant find java?
item.dc:creator: @cane191 cane191
item.description:
@cane191 wrote:

hey when i try to run my client folder i get this message…

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
press any key to continure. . .

and this is what i have down in the run.bat file…

@echo off
title BatScape Client
cd src
java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1
pause

if anybody knows howto fix thatd be cool thanks! cane

Read full topic
